description:
Hi there!

Thanks for takin' a minute to check out my app! My name is Michele Paige and I am very excited to introduce my very first MXP™ App! 

What is the MXP™ on webOS App you ask? Good question! The MXP™ App is designed to be like an extra mini version of my website, michelexp.com. It is definitely not just a "babe" or "wallpaper" app.

Ok, that is all well and good, but you wunna' know what you get, and what you don't get. Fair enough. Here's the rundown:

What you get:

Photo Galleries:
	-100% exclusive content. You won't find these pics anywhere other than here or my official sites, unless it has been ripped off.
	-Dynamic content updates weekly.
	-Multiple Photo Galleries featuring cool pics of yours truly.
	-Dedicated background pics to match the MXP™ App.
	-Images optimized for Pre and Pixi. We didn't slack on this.
	-Two-way gallery browsing.
	-Landscape support.
	-Images are 25% larger than native screen resolutions to make sure you get lots of zoom-in satisfaction. This may cause them to load a tad bit slower, but hey, it's a trade-off.
	-Save favorites to device.
	-Add your favorites to your Switcharoo or background app database.
	- Send my pics via email and MMS.
	-View favs in device photo gallery.

Follow my updates from my MXP™ Mobile Blog and get the scoop on what I have going on at michelexp.com.

My Official 2¢ Button: I want to keep adding features and make this app as good as it can be, so I expect to hear from you.

What you don't get:

NO ADVERTISING
	-No annoying adds trying to get you to sign up for a cheap app or find out what your name means, wasting your time and robbing you of precious screen real estate.
	-endless galleries that take forever to find what you are looking for.	

NO NUDITY
	-Hey, it's against the rules.

NO PHOTOS of OTHER PEOPLE
	-Juuust me ;)

Disclaimer:
Images and dialogue are designed to be light-hearted, fun, and are generally of a sexy nature.
